* Carnage hung her head and sighed, she missed her dead friend greatly.*

" Yes, Dinobot is...dead. But it has always been a comfort to me to know 
that he died a hero, a great hero."

* That was her one weakness, the thoughts of the past always brought painful 
memories to the surface and seemed to stop the world in it's tracks.
Yes, Dinobot was dead. Her last best friend, her last best allie.
Carnage looked up at Cyber Claw, her solum expression now turning into solid 
rock. Did she hear the clone right, she wanted to join them?
That was a first!
She studied the clone for a moment, why would she want to join them? She had 
thought that the clone hated them because Teltoli was a Maximal.
Carnage glared at Cyber Claw and bared her teeth but then sighed and 
growled.*

" How do I know that I can trust you, after all, you did try and kill me 
back there! How do I know that you won't try again?!"
